response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value, worth $1,200,000 to you, and we believe it could significantly contribute to your endeavors. We are offering this remarkable asset at a special price tailored to reflect its true worth and your potential investment in it. Our proposal is to extend the offer at $1,150,000. This represents an outstanding chance to secure such a valuable item at a highly competitive price. We trust this offer will align with your financial goals and expectations. Should you be interested in proceeding, please let us know, and we will guide you through the next steps. Thank you for considering this extraordinary opportunity.", "product_price": 1150000}
